text: @braddoesfilm There‚Äôs a whole scene in CLERKS III about it!

At lunch with my Mom and my Kid.
A couple of Cat Ladies, separated by 54 years.
My whole life, whenever my Mom gave me advice, I tolerated it with a nod. 
Harley just listened to my Mom‚Äôs advice for a half hour and was like ‚ÄúGrandma is so wise.‚Äù https://t.co/AfNKqz317R

Friday Hummus!
Made for my Mom, Wife, and Kid.
I used to go out on Friday nights.
Go to parties.
See movies.
Now I just make fuckin‚Äô Hummus.

@WonderedAlways Only if I drop dead right after.
Which, with this old heart of mine, is always a distinct possibility.
@Mr_Puck_Cancer @The_SecretStash Not yet, but I saw the Jersey yesterday in the back room, waiting to be numbered.
@d20fitness If Twitter offered unlimited characters, I would‚Äôve, indeed, called it the Affleck/Adams scene.

Some very cool comic book pages hang near the bathroom at @The_SecretStash!
First, it‚Äôs an actual Daredevil page drawn by Frank Miller! 
And then we‚Äôve got a Tim Sale Batman double page spread! I have lots of original comics art, so maybe I‚Äôll start sharing pics of it all soon! https://t.co/y9C9KqiCa1
@Real_EllenPage That explanation sounds made up, so I‚Äôm gonna need you to sight references.

@hasUnow @DiscountChuck That‚Äôs not @DiscountChuck.

@TheMike3D @DiscountChuck Last night at @SModcastle, I showed something to the folks at the SOTU for https://t.co/c2Xw8c2aGm that will REALLY make you cry, @TheMike3D...
@DrRichardK_CMH I just asked Kevin Smith and he said you‚Äôre right!
@NajarianNick Top of July, I‚Äôve heard...
@KScheebz287 Thanks for scaling the @SModcastle walls! More https://t.co/c2Xw8c2aGm events will be happening in Jersey and all over the country this fall, when we tour CLERKS III!

Beyond the fact that you‚Äôre a Kraken of a co-creator, what I *like* about you is how good you made me look in this pic. But the thing I *love* about you @DiscountChuck is that you made friends I long loved look even better! You saw them like I always did and helped them to soar!
@DrRichardK_CMH I just asked him and, directly from the mouth of Old Kevin Smith, he told me you‚Äôre wrong.

But you showed me a cartoon version of myself tattooed on your leg!
So *you* are *my* hero!
Enjoy the Jersey Shore.
I‚Äôll hold down the fort in LA while you‚Äôre gone, starting tomorrow.
But TONIGHT, I will be all aboot the BABBLE with @RalphGarman!
Tix here: https://t.co/D9DXdX7TvZ

@DjGavinSays Not sure that‚Äôs it.
I just think some folks in this world wanna tell other folks what they want them to say or not say -
and I‚Äôve always been the other guy.
Except when it came to film critics.
I used to wanna tell all of them to say I was good, back when I was a baby director.

@Real_EllenPage Your Tweet reads Totalitarian in nature - because you want conformity from people with whom you disagree on some stuff.
I dunno... Sounds kinda like your definition of ‚ÄúWoke‚Äù.

@dontbetribal I can only speak for my movies, which have always been fueled by the Live & Let Live ethos instilled in me by my parents. The ‚Äúnowadays‚Äù portion of your Tweet is an entirely different conversation that doesn‚Äôt really involve me at all because, as per my thesis, I Live & Let Live.

@Misterj_69 Well, no.
If you follow the conversation, you‚Äôll see the guy didn‚Äôt mention Masters at all: solely Clerks and Chasing Amy.
But if you think my old work is fine, then what are you waiting for, man?
GO DEFEND ME TO THAT GUY!
Also?
I don‚Äôt drink soy.
Post heart attack, I go @oatly.

@GMetherell Well it *is* a sequel.
Kinda the point NOT to be original.
Trick is to find a way to make it feel fresh & worth the trip.
And this Fall, folks will have a chance to see if I pulled it off.
Good news? You were never gonna be forced to yawn thru it, as attendance is not mandatory.
@Lupinfan83 Both.

@jeclark1126 Heavens yes!
Starts in September!

Some folks say I went ‚Äúwoke‚Äù recently, but I‚Äôve been including content/characters that can be described as such since the beginning. Blame my Mom and Dad: they raised me to ‚ÄúLive & Let Live‚Äù, so the flicks reflect THEIR belief in Life, Liberty, & the Pursuit of Happiness FOR ALL.

My reaction to the last time I watched Chasing Amy was the Affleck scene in Jay & Silent Bob Reboot.
And you can see my reaction to my most recent viewing of Clerks this Fall, when CLERKS III hits screens!
(In it, Dante & Randal make a black&white movie called ‚ÄúIn Convenience.‚Äù)

When have I ever tried to ‚Äúcancel‚Äù anything but dentist appointments?
Also, Technically...
Current day Kevin Smith *is* Old Kevin Smith. I‚Äôm 51 - the kid who made Clerks was 22.
So if you‚Äôre *really* more interested in ‚Äúold‚Äù Kevin Smith, look no further.
Here I am.
Old as fuck...

@DiscoD_83 So sorry to hear, sir. My condolences. Losing my Dad was like losing a limb, so I can imagine what you‚Äôre going through. Happy to hear I play even a small part in your memories of him.‚ù§Ô∏è

@Halaylah That was a scene suggested by Guin Turner. Back then (we‚Äôre talking 1996, when I was writing Amy), Guin said it was a prejudice some of her bi friends experienced. Admittedly, the scene is a little heavy-handed - but it does contain a discussion about pronouns.
